en_ZA {
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss a",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm",
            "dd MMMM yyyy",
            "dd MMMM yyyy",
            "yyyy/MM/dd",
            "yy/MM/dd",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    LocaleID { "1c09" }
    LocaleString { "en_ZA" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;\u00A4-#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "ZAF" }
}
